recipes.title: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: A hearty Italian pasta dish with rich meat sauce.

steps.title: Prepare Ingredients
steps.instruction: Chop the onion, mince the garlic, and prepare all other ingredients.
tips: Use a sharp knife for easier chopping.
You can prepare everything in advance to save time later.

steps.title: Cook the Onion and Garlic
steps.instruction: Heat olive oil in a pan, then add the onion and garlic. Saut√© until translucent.
tips: Do not let the garlic brown to avoid bitterness.

steps.title: Add and Brown the Meat
steps.instruction: Add minced beef to the pan and cook until browned evenly.
tips: Break the meat apart with a wooden spoon to avoid clumps.

steps.title: Add Tomatoes and Simmer
steps.instruction: Stir in canned tomatoes and tomato paste. Simmer for 30 minutes.
tips: Add a pinch of sugar if the sauce tastes too acidic.
Cover partially to avoid splattering while simmering.

steps.title: Cook Spaghetti
steps.instruction: Boil spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente.
tips: Do not rinse pasta after draining to help the sauce cling better.

steps.title: Combine and Serve
steps.instruction: Mix the sauce with the spaghetti and garnish with fresh basil.
tips: Top with grated Parmesan for extra flavor.
